summary: A young man is searching for the woman of his dreams. In pursuit of love he sails out to a midsummer party in the seductive Swedish archipelago.
cast: Peter Magnusson|David Hellenius|Mirja Turestedt|Moa Gammel|Alexandra Rapaport|Peter Dalle|Christine Meltzer|Tanja Lorentzon|Dan Ekborg|Ruth Vega Fernandez|Niklas Engdahl|Carl Ingemarsson Stjernlöf|Puck Ahlsell|Pelle Bergmark|Sara Grahed-Thunberg|Ida Gyllensten|Lisbeth Johansson|Marko Lehtosalo|Kenny Mattson|Anette Stenson-Fjordefalk|Nathalie Söderqvist|Martin Timell|Andreas Tottie|Cecilia Wallin
title: Sommaren med Göran
